Title: A modular tethering complex for endosomal recycling
Abstract: © 2015 Macmillan Publishers Limited.How proteins migrate through the interconnected organelles of the endolysosomal system is poorly understood. A piece of the puzzle has been added with the identification of a complex of tethering factors that functions in the recycling of proteins towards the cell surface.
